title: How to use Turnitin to check plagiarism - Quora

response.answer_text: I have account access for turnitin. I wish to check my paper for plagiarism before sending it for publication. I am not able to understand how to do that. Whether I should use it as an instructor or a student and what is the difference between the 2. Also, how to avoid saving my draft in the repository? It is the first time am using turnitin. Any help is appreciated.
Hii You can use this link Plagiarism Checker Free | Accurate with Percentage Regards Asad
